document.full_text: toshiba corp and sony corp are in the final stages of talks to combine their small lcd panel units and sell up to 80 percent of the new entity to the japanese government, the nikkei business daily reported on tuesday.
document.title: toshiba, sony in talks to merge small lcd panel
lines_and_colors: toshiba corp and sony corp are in the final stages of talks to combine their small lcd panel units and sell up to 80 percent of the new entity to the japanese government, the nikkei business daily reported on tuesday.
